answers.answer: I would just eat it, like everything, in moderation. Gestational diabetes is probably the main concern, however my first pregnancy I ate chocolate constantly, and my son is perfectly healthy, I ate it with my 2nd pregnancy too and my daughter is just fine! :)
Thanks I'm about to eat one !!!! :D
I would still go for it. The biggest concerns are gestational diabetes and the caffeine that  is in it. Almost anything in moderation is okay
I agree...its not gonna hurt.  Theres no need to suffer without having chocolate once in awhile...we suffer enough :)
I drink chocolate milk a lot so I get my calcium. I thought I was doing a good thing.  :/

I drink the nesquick chocolate milk, it'd got the protein and its mostly caffeine free, people have made me so paranoid on what I can and cannot eat!! Chocolate is fine in.moderation as the other ladies stated. I even freaked out about eating twizzlers

I drink chocolate milk all the time. Im getting the protein and calcium I need. Not a big fan of candy right now haha. But, I've been drinking 3-4 glasses a day since 10 weeks and I'm 16 weeks now and my doctor says my little one is super healthy:)
I asked my doc bcuz I was eating it everyday lol he said its fine in moderation. Just dont eat alot.
Nice :) now I'm craving that chocolate milk
Agreed with ktowne is all about moderation hun
( yet i eat a shitload ;)   Its just soo good )

Oh in the beginnin all the way up until a few weeks ago wen my appetite decreased I ate chocolate constantly... Drink chocolate milk all the time still.. chocolate was Wat I craved... I'm 38 weeks now nd my lil girl is healthy nd growin :) eat the chocolate haha

been to doc lastweek and i was bit pissed off..coz she told me not to eat any sweets and icetea!!which is unfortunately what im craving..i dont like chocolqtes earlier in my pregnancy but now im 33wks..since 30wks i was eating chocolate..well after that docs visit my partner wont allow me to eat choco again but sorry to say just last thursday i had 1 whole chocolate cake alone....
When my mother was pregnant with me she told me that once a week she ate a whole cake. She only gained 30lbs. She says not to worry too much on what you eat, as long as you are also staying healthy.
I eat it all the time...its okay.

question: Hi I'm 9w+6 and everyone is telling that is bad to eat chocolate the candy or the liquid is this true ... Cus I've been craving it sooo bad I LOVE IT
title: Chocolate
